problem_text_cn: 如图,⊙O中,CD是切线,切点是D,直线CO交⊙O于B、A,∠A=20°,则∠C的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in ⊙O, CD is the tangent line, the tangent vertex is D, the straight line CO intersects ⊙O at B and A, ∠A = N_0, then the degree of ∠C is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查的是切线的性质和圆周角定理,掌握圆的切线垂直于经过切点的半径是解题的关键．
